citeinfo.origin: Digital Social Science Center (DSSC), Columbia University Libraries
citeinfo.title: Topographic Map of Babeldaob South, Republic of Palau, Caroline Islands, 2000

pubinfo.publish: U.S. Dept of the Interior, U.S. Geological Survey

descript.abstract: This is a scanned version of the 2004 paper map entitled: Topographic Map of Babeldaob South, Republic of Palau, Caroline Islands, 2000. The map was scanned at 300 dots per inch and is in the TIFF format.
descript.purpose: Scanned maps may be used for a variety of purposes. This image may be used in a GIS.
descript.supplinf: 1 map : col. ; 85 x 96 cm. Scale 1:25,000 ; universal transverse Mercator proj. (E 134^(0)26?00?--E 134^(0)39?00?/N 7^(0)34?00?--N 7^(0)22?30?). Relief shown by contours and spot heights. Depths shown by isolines and soundings. Includes location diagram. "NGA 1044 II NE-SERIES W856; NGA 1144 III NW-SERIES W856; NGA 1044 II SE-SERIES W856; NGA 1144 III SW-SERIES W856; NGA 1044 I SE-SERIES W856; NGA 1144 IV SW-SERIES 856."

cntorgp.cntorg: Research Data Services (RDS), Columbia University Libraries

idinfo.native: Microsoft Windows XP Version 5.1 (Build 2600) Service Pack 3; ESRI ArcCatalog 9.3.1.3500

dataqual.logic: The raster image is a faithfully reproduced digital image of the original source map. Some differences may be detected between the source graphic used and the raster image due to the RGB values assigned that particular color. The intent is to recreate those colors as near as possible.
dataqual.complete: Data completeness for digitized paper map files reflect the content of the source graphic.
